name: Sunbaoshi's Study Dairy
tagline: NodeJS R Python Machine Learning Cloud Computing
body:
## MyStudy: Baoshi's study and exercise code.
I've been a C/C++ and VB developer for many years. Time changed and we have to do with colossal data in our business.
I found I am so interested in data analysis work. I took a few on-line courses and did some self taught.
I included exercise code here for my review later. Particularly, refer to my [Datascience Coursera](http://sunbaoshi1975.github.io/datasciencecoursera/) repository for field assignments.
* Node.JS & JavaScript
* Python
* Octave
* R

The courses I'm taking or finished include:
* Machine Learning [by Andrew Ng from Stanford]
* Practical Machine Learning [by Jeff Leek, PhD, Roger D. Peng, PhD, Brian Caffo, PhD from Johns Hopkins]
* Cloud Computing [by Indranil Gupta from Illinois]
* Programming for Everybody (Python) [by Charles Severance from Michigan]
* R Programming [by Roger D. Peng, PhD, Jeff Leek, PhD, Brian Caffo, PhD from Johns Hopkins]
* etc.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
